resources:
GuidMe
//Day tour to Skopje //ingredients
Ages 0-99, max of 15 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Macedonia Square, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: The Stone Bridge, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Memorial House of Mother Teresa, Macedonia Str. No.9, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia
//Old Bazar tour
Ages 0-99, max of 15 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Old Bazaar, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Kale Fortress, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Sultan Murat Mosque, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia
//Canon Matka Tour
Ages 0-99, max of 15 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Matka Canyon, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Boat Ride, Matka Canyon, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Cave at Matka, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia
//Vodno Mountain Tour
Ages 0-99, max of 15 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Millennium Cross, Vodno Mountain 
Stop At: Cable Car Ride, Vodno Mountain 
Stop At: Saint Panteleimon Monastery, Vodno Mountain
//Cultural and Historical Tour of Skopje
Ages 0-99, max of 15 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Museum of the City of Skopje, Mito Hadzivasilev Jasmin 22, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Skopje Fortress (Kale), Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Church of St. Clement of Ohrid, Blvd. Partizanski Odredi 17, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia
//Art and Architecture Tour of Skopje
Ages 0-99, max of 15 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Museum of Contemporary Art, Samoilova 17, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Macedonian Opera and Ballet, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Art Bridge, Skopje 1000 Republic of North Macedonia
//Day Tour to Ohrid Ages 0-99, max of 20 per group 
Mobile ticket 
Live guide: English Stop At: Lake Ohrid, Ohrid Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Ancient Theatre of Ohrid, Old Town, Ohrid Republic of North Macedonia 
Stop At: Church of St. John at Kaneo, Kaneo Plaosnik Pateka, Ohrid 6000 Republic of North Macedonia
//About Skopje
Skopje is home to the Stone Bridge, a symbol of the city that dates back to the 6th century.

The city was heavily damaged by a catastrophic earthquake in 1963, leading to a significant rebuilding effort. 
Skopje is Old Bazaar is one of the largest and most well-preserved marketplaces in the Balkans, showcasing the city is Ottoman heritage. 
The Millennium Cross, located on Vodno Mountain, is one of the tallest crosses in the world. 
Skopje is known for its diverse architecture, combining Byzantine, Ottoman, Neoclassical, and Brutalist styles. 
 The name Skopje is derived from the Latin word "Scupi," which was the name of a settlement in the area during the Roman period. The name evolved over the centuries, influenced by various cultures and languages that dominated the region.
